abstract: A mention of the NBC chimes as an example of an aural logo generated many e-mail messages. Some of them follow below.
snippet: A mention of the NBC chimes as an example of an aural logo generated many e-mail messages. Some of them follow below.
lead_paragraph: A couple of recent Q & A sections of the newsletter have discussed the concept of aural logos. A mention of the NBC chimes as an example of an aural logo generated many e-mail messages. Some of them follow below.

abstract: On a day of stunning gains on Wall Street, with the Dow Jones industrial average climbing more than 11 percent on Monday, General Electric stood out as the only loser among the Dow 30.
lead_paragraph: On a day of stunning gains on Wall Street, with the Dow Jones industrial average climbing more than 11 percent on Monday, General Electric stood out as the only loser among the Dow 30.

headline.main: G.E. Loses Ground Despite the Market’s Surge
